Detailed Description

cvmx_ulfe_indirect_addr

This register provides the address for indirect accesses to ULFE's internal memories. To read/write an internal memory, software first writes an address to ULFE_INDIRECT_ADDR, and then reads/writes the data register ULFE_INDIRECT_DATA.

To access the beam-former coefficient semi-static parameters, use the addresses definied by the ULFE_IND_ADR_BFC0_E enumeration.

These registers should only be used for debug and diagnostic use. Reading/writing memories while ULFE is active might result in undefined behavior.
